tutorial2.en: We're going live soon, so let's get you acquainted with the way this all works.

tutorial3.en: Try moving around with WASD, and shooting with the Arrow Keys.

tutorial4.en: Great. Move into the next room, please.

tutorial5.en: Defeat the enemy in the center of the screen.

tutorial7.en: You have probably noticed the score display on the top of the screen.

tutorial8.en: Your score increases when you defeat enemies, clear rooms, or things of that nature.

tutorial9.en: But your score steadily decreases as time passes.

tutorial10.en: It also goes down quite a bit when you get hit.

tutorial11.en: If your score reaches 0, the game will end.

tutorial12.en: Don't worry, for this tutorial your score will never go below 500.

tutorial14.en: This room has two enemies in it. Defeat them both, and move on.

tutorial16.en: You can pick up and aim them with the arrow keys, and throw them with space.

tutorial20.en: If you find yourself lost, remember that unvisited rooms have a darker floor.

tutorial21.en: I must go now, but I trust you to make it to the main stage. Good luck.

tutorialsecret2.en: I don't think you should be here right now.
